body:
Hi all, Myv here.

Me and 5 of my friends have a YouTube channel that we started around 3 months ago, we have 78 subs and are an (hopefully) up and coming channel. We're really trying to push for 100 subs and would appreciate likes and subs. We will hopefully be subbing everyone back that subs on here, and we hope you enjoy our content.

This is probably going to get locked because for some reason Mods hate these posts but I'll carry on anyway.

We upload every day, with no particular rota but we try to keep consistent and upload good content.

We upload Black Ops 3, AC Syndicate, Need For Speed, Loadout, and we hope to be doing Rainbow Six Siege and Fallout, amongst other things.

I hope you will sub, we appreciate it!

The link is here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHkD3BGUxVvi3yTi4O3Ji4Q
A video of me talking is here if anyone cares xd: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XeI5vqEnthA
Cheers.

title: Youtube Channel!
